summary: The TypeScript SDK's gRPC inbound message size limit is capped at 4MB, but should be increased to 128MB to match other SDKs and handle larger server responses.
userImpact: Users unable to handle responses larger than 4MB from the server, causing failures in workflows with large data payloads.
rootCause: gRPC inbound message size limit is hardcoded or set to 4MB instead of 128MB.
proposedFix: Increase inbound message size limit from 4MB to 128MB to match other SDK implementations.
resolutionDetails: Issue was closed, indicating the inbound message size limit was increased to 128MB.
keyQuote: To match other SDKs, _inbound_ message size limit from server should be 128MB (not to be confused with outbound).
